Class TextPMTextField

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, javax.swing.SwingConstants, KeyBindingProcessor, View<ITextPM>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BnTextField
public class TextPMTextField
extends javax.swing.JTextField
implements KeyBindingProcessor, View<ITextPM>

The TextPMTextField is a JTextField that is a view on an ITextPM.

Author:
Michael Karneim

processKeyBinding

public boolean processKeyBinding(javax.swing.KeyStroke ks,
                                 java.awt.event.KeyEvent e,
                                 int condition,
                                 boolean pressed)
Description copied from interface: KeyBindingProcessor
This is invoked as the result of a KeyEvent that was not consumed by the FocusManager, KeyListeners, or the component. It will first try WHEN_FOCUSED bindings, then WHEN_ANCESTOR_OF_FOCUSED_COMPONENT bindings, and finally WHEN_IN_FOCUSED_WINDOW bindings.

Specified by:
processKeyBinding in interface KeyBindingProcessor
Overrides:
processKeyBinding in class javax.swing.JComponent
e - the unconsumed KeyEvent
pressed - true if the key is pressed
Returns:
true if there is a key binding for e
